website_summaries.verdict: An attractive option – both physically and price-wise – that is both roomy and sturdy.
pros: Comes in your choice of 3 really nice color combos
Bail handle folds flat for easy storage
Sturdy construction that you can sit on
Lockable lid comes with cup holders and a media slot for hands-free viewing
cons: water can easily leak into the cooler
Some reports of this cooler arriving damaged

customer_reviews.title: Huge improvement
customer_reviews.text: Huge improvement! I work HVAC. You get pretty hungry. On the right is my old box I couldn’t even fit a salad container in. The choice is yours.
customer_reviews.author: charlie warren

customer_reviews.title: Massive lunch box
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in the mail. Fast delivery. Believe the reviews. This thing is SPACIOUS. I'm able to fit TWO gallon milk jugs side by side with a couple inches left over for head clearance. Seems very sturdy, didn't crush or make any stress noises when i sat on it, and I'm a bigger guy. Handle seems sturdy and carries well due to the thinner profile of the cooler. For $20 its a steal
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Awesome work cooler
customer_reviews.text: My husband was looking for a cooler that he could also sit on during breaks at work. Tried out a few others that felt like the lids were going to snap when you sat on them but this one is sturdy! He loves everything about this cooler. Very happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: ChinaCatSunflower

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: why would anyone pay hundreds of dollars for a cooler? This cooler does the job. It sits in my hot truck all day long and barely any ice melts.
customer_reviews.author: johnnyrust

customer_reviews.title: I really like the cooler
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cooler. Strong and nice shape. But I work construction outside all year everyday and when it rains or snows the water leakes right in. Especially when you open the lid the water in the cup holders runs right down and into the cooler. But if your indoors everyday this will be a nice cooler for you.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Anderson Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mid size cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent mid size cooler. Big and deep, yet easy to carry. I use it to pack my lunch and beverage to the beach in very hot Florida. Keeps my food and drinks nice and cold all day long. Sturdy and well made. Great value for $20 that i paid. I'm very happy with my purchase and would highly recommend it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Cyber Guy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It’s taking a beating and holding up well. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Correa8

customer_reviews.title: NOT lockable
customer_reviews.text: 3 times I ordered this cooler and 3 times returned it. The picture on amazon shows the red section has a loop just like the top black section has a loop to be able to lock it closed. 3 times it arrive at my house with the red section flat so the top has the loop hole to be able to place a lock but the bottom does not! I figured at some point I would be shipped a product that was manufactured as see and advertised as lockable but NOPE! So if you need it to lock skip this one!
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small cooler to put on my boat that would keep things cold with direct sunlight on it in 100+ degree temperatures. Was really tempted by those fancy new big dollar coolers out there, but just couldn't bring myself to spend a couple of hundred on a small cooler. This one holds ice great for me. I'm not counting on it to do multiple days of ice or anything, but that ice cold can of pop on the drive home from the lake is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Broken within 4 days!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler broke in less than a week! I got it for my husband to have on his work truck. All he had inside was a sandwich, some fruit a couple bottles of water and a cold pack! The handle broke off on one side. This is crazy because it’s not even hardly anything inside of it and it’s not heavy! This cooler was either cheaply made or defective! I’m very disappointed and I will be requesting a replacement or a refund
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality keeps cold for days
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for work for my husband and I. On lunch we go out to the car an here we go, it holds ice and even when the ice does melt it’s stays cold for a couple of days. This is an excellent cooler perfect size I usually put about 4/5 bottles of water 6 mini gatorades I put about 2 kids size juice bottles. 2/3 v8 cans and 2 sandwiches on the top. Even after all that there’s still a little room I highly recommend getting this cooler for any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: hayden718

customer_reviews.title: The way the lid hinges open it will dump sand in the cooler
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay...keeps good cold decent size for 2 people. I do not like how the lid opens. If there is any sand st all and you open the lid it slides into the cooler. My sister has the smaller one and the lid covers the whole top with deeper cup holders...these cup holders are terry shallow.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Hunt Boucher

customer_reviews.title: I bought 3 defective coolers from Amazon, all of them had the same issue
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased three defective Igloo Profile 16 Quart Cooler on Amazon. The problem with each cooler was that they did not have the molded loops on the liner, which prevented the cooler to be locked. As you can see in the Amazon reviews, several other customers have also reported the same issue. For each of my purchases, I had to return the cooler and ordered a new one, hoping that the new one would not be defective. Unfortunately, that was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Jose R

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my rancher boyfriend, it goes into trucks, tractors, semis and lord knows where else. It's dropped, kicked and put through the ringer. Still in very good condition after 4 months with no end in sight. I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacke Vaughan

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my boyfriend because he’s older one had broke. He uses it for work every single day. I’m allowed to pack three full meals and still have room in this lunchbox. I would suggest this to anyone who is looking for a sturdy lunchbox for!Ordered for my boyfriend because his older one had broke. He uses it for work every single day. I’m allowed to pack three full meals and still have room in this lunchbox. I would suggest to anyone who is looking for a sturdy lunchbox for work!
customer_reviews.author: Emily Davault

customer_reviews.title: Love the size
customer_reviews.text: Keeps ice for 3 or 4 days. Love the size. Room for ice and tall drinks. Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Lili rose

customer_reviews.title: Cheapo cooler, doesnt seal and handle broke within a week
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed for it being an igloo, doesnt seal very well and food gets warm very quickly. The top doesnt even seal well enough to keep rain out. The handle broke within a week also
customer_reviews.author: Jagger Cox

customer_reviews.title: Replaced with a good one
customer_reviews.text: New Review: Ok, now I'm happy I received a replacement. Old Review: I received the coller and I love it but..... My cooler is defective, I cannot lock the lid. The holes for the lock in the coller are missing. Product is not as advertised in photo description. I will request a return and I hope to received a good one since I like it a lot. Will update...
customer_reviews.author: Dax

customer_reviews.title: Tuff cooler
customer_reviews.text: The first one was defective ( deformed on the bottom front ). I requested a replacement and it arrived promptly. I like this ice chest. Very handy. Not to big but still hold 24 cans plus ice. Use cold cans or replace the first load of ice after an hour or so depending on how hot the cans where when you loaded it and how hot it is outside. Keeps already cold beverages cold for about 10 hours in my service van. It often sets in the sun all day when I am on an install and not running service so it gets really hot ( Atlanta gets hot in the summer).
customer_reviews.author: D. H.

customer_reviews.title: I like this thing a lot
customer_reviews.text: I work in IT and work 12 hour shifts (sometimes 18 hours). I wanted something that would allow me to place my larger water jug and mixer cup (they're 40 Oz. and 45 Oz containers, respectively) along with the food and snacks for me throughout the shift. Using a regular gel ice pack, this cooler keep everything chilly and fresh for my entire shift. No complaints! I like this thing a lot!
customer_reviews.author: Preyer

customer_reviews.title: This cooler does the trick!
customer_reviews.text: Needed this as a 'car cooler' for road trips to store milk, sandwiches and a couple of drinks. In my 74 degree house, it kept ice packs cold from 4pm through to the next morning at 9am (because I was too lazy to empty it out that night). The cooler fits perfectly behind the drivers side seat. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jill W

customer_reviews.title: Keeps it cold!
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is large enough for at least 12 bottles or 18 cans and it keeps the items cold. I left it out overnight and the next morning the ice packs were still frozen. The lid actually stays closed and there is no fear of the lid unexpectedly coming open. Also, the lid has a place to put your beverage. Very nice small cooler especially for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Maemabel

customer_reviews.title: Handy little cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler to put between the seats of my Peterbilt truck. I keep half a dozen drinks of various sizes, along with snacks that are temperature sensitive. It’s a perfect fit for my purpose. There’s nothing overly noteworthy about it, it’s a quality Igloo cooler that performs exactly as one would expect. I have several Igloo coolers of various sizes, and they’ve all been great.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: A durable day cooler for under $20 (when I bought)?  Yes, please!
customer_reviews.text: Listen, I like a great cooler just as much as the rest of the world. But, what are we trying to accomplish here? For a cooler of this size, you're probably looking for a day cooler; something that's going to keep drinks and snacks cool for a day trip. We're protecting a $1 bag of ice. The Igloo Profile 16 Quart Cooler is perfect for my needs. Keeps beer cold. Keeps non-beer stuff cool. It doesn't cost and arm and a leg. If it gets stolen (not a lot of people eyeing my cooler), I'll regret losing the contents than the cooler, and then I'll plunk down another $18-20 to replace this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: chadrico

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for in the car
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a medium-size cooler that would be good for drinks and snacks when we travel. This is not so big and heavy that it needs wheels, but large enough to hold a good selection of drinks. It fit's perfectly just behind the front seats of our minivan without crowding the middle seat passengers. The top is flat so you can set drinks on it, or even sit on it - it feels very sturdy. After a 13-day, 3,000 mile trip, we are VERY happy with this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement.
customer_reviews.text: What a joke. My cooler did NOT come with a lockable lid. Despite the pictures on ads, the label on the cooler itself, and Amazon it does NOT have a hoop for the lid on the red part of the cooler,so there's nothing for the lock to lock on to.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Defective Manufacturing
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have also noted, my item arrived without the loops on the lower half that enable you to lock the cooler. I wonder how something so obvious gets past the manufacturer. Maybe some people don't mind, and that's okay for them. I'd like to have the loops please.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Made in Texas!
customer_reviews.text: Growing up in Houston I wasn't too far from the original Igloo plant so I've always had a little bit of loyalty to the brand. I try to buy "made in USA" whenever I can and Igloo still makes about 20% of their products in Texas. I am using this cooler daily and keep it behind the drivers seat. It fits perfectly between the driver's and back seats. I like how the handle tucks neatly out of the way. I keep bottled water and Gatorade in the cooler primarily but it's good to know it's roomy enough to put a lunch etc in there. The price is right at under $27
customer_reviews.author: C W

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold for several days
customer_reviews.text: I looked through several reviews for what I would call a medium sized ice chest for the better part of a day. This one seemed to have the best reviews, so I took a chance. We took this ice chest on a long weekend trip to try it out. I put my ice-maker ice in the large zip-lock bags and used two of these bags full bags of ice. The ice chest was loaded Thursday morning. We still had about half that ice on Sunday morning. We still had quite a bit of room for soft drinks and water, plus some food items for sandwiches and snacks for the trip.
customer_reviews.author: Lavender Lover

customer_reviews.title: nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Keeps stuff reasonably cold during the work day in my truck.. And it is pretty sturdy I have had it for quite some time and it's holding up well on jobsites. I only wish it was a little bigger. I looked at alot of coolers and everything was either kinda small or really big, there isn't much selection in the medium size range for coolers for some reason, and I looked at 100 coolers back when I bought this one...
customer_reviews.author: rky222k

customer_reviews.title: A Brining Miracle
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this to brine a turkey and needed it to fit in my refrigerator. This exceeded my expectations. My 11 pound turkey (could easily fit a 20 pounder) is now happily swimming in the brine and is inside my 25 cu. ft. refrigerator. The price can't be beat for the purpose. Brining bags alone can be costly and add a lidded bucket (and the inconvenience of having to keep things cold outside of a refrigerator) and you'd be better off going to a 5 star restaurant. The added bonus is this will be around for a very long time and easily toted to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh.
customer_reviews.text: Okay so the dimensions they give are apparently outside dimensions which I wasn't thinking about, shame on me, so the inside space is a little smaller than I was inspecting. It is nice and sturdy, it will do. I don't understand the locking feature as I have included a pic. There's one loop on each corner of the lid but no loops on the base of the cooler. There's nothing to lock it to LOL I don't get it.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty Blonde

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: I drive a delivery truck, so I needed something durable enough to handle being thrown around the cargo area, and this cooler is definitely that durable. I needed one big enough to hold 12 hours worth of ice and drinks. It fit 8 16oz water bottles, 2 32oz Gatorade, and a full bag of ice. I had cold drinks from 9am Saturday all the way through Sunday night. I just left everything in to see how long it lasted. Buy the cooler! It doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: strumcat

customer_reviews.title: Now that is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 7 qt. cooler for my 17 year old son who is working construction this summer but it wasn't big enough for him. This cooler is PERFECT. Much lighter than our Yeti. I think it has more room than our Yeti of about the same size. He is able to bring all of his drinks (usually 4), and all of his lunch (2 subs, chips, snacks and fruit). It's a cool color too. He's only had this for 2 weeks but he hasn't complained about it. It does have a cool locking feature to it if you think your coworkers will steal your lunch. lol
customer_reviews.author: Amy Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Handle falls off in hot outside temperatures.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this cooler for work and the handle comes lose in the Georgia heat. The plastic softens and the handle falls off completely. Would not recommend buying if you plan on being in hot temperatures. Also, you only have thirty days to file a claim with Amazon after purchase so I’m SOL.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE HUNT

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product.  Have used Igloo brand before.
customer_reviews.text: Well made, easy to clean. Good for mostly 12 oz. canned drinks. With it's 12" width it can get a bit tight if using long necked bottled beers or sodas and not good for 1.5 L bottles like wine. With their slightly longer 13" length it has to be laid at an angle and just barely fits in this cooler. So, by the time you put some ice in you can only get maybe just one 6-pack of soda or beer below this size bottle. Just another inch or so in width and it would be swell. Had I realized this I would have gotten a slightly larger model.
customer_reviews.author: SCOOTER42

customer_reviews.title: Three star very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really like the cooler but I am very disappointed for the product received. As you can see in the picture I ordered for my husband the cooler that have loops to use a lock I love so do he. I ordered a second cooler same as my husband this past week and I received the cooler that miss both bottom loops. I asked for a replacement and received the same defective cooler. I don't think that the product is check it before packed. How could you same twice the same defective item? I am very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Rodica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my hubby who drives all day to keep his food cold for 16hrs on his work days . He hasn’t used it yet so I can’t say how long it keeps the food cold but I will do an updated review. Also this is the perfect size for 1-2 ppl,not too big , perfect for a day trip. I would say if you have a family with kids &you wanted this for a day trip you may need a bigger cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Leeny

customer_reviews.title: Have had more expensive coolers that weren't that good!
customer_reviews.text: Left this cooler in the car for 36 hours in the sun in 80 degree weather and it still had ice in it. When we got home 48 hours later it still had some ice left and we had opened it several times. Have had more expensive coolers that weren't that good!
customer_reviews.author: W.E. B.

customer_reviews.title: Great size. Not too big so it fills up ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size. Not too big so it fills up all of the car's trunk , but holds a surprising amount of stuff. Tall enough for wine bottles! Kept things chilled on a 7 hr car ride in 80-90 degree heat. It was kept in backseat though, not trunk, but we weren't using the AC so was still in a warm area. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't keep ice.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler for camping trips to keep a 7 pound bag of ice for drinks because I use block ice in my main cooler. I was disappointed because it doesn't seem to last more than than a day. To me, it's nothing more than a container. Also, if it rains, water gets in. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Thing is a beast. Even if you're in a pinch and don't have ice, if the item you're putting in is already chilled this thing will impress you. I'm a big, heavy guy and I demand all my gear stand up to hard use. I sit on this thing, have tossed it around empty, full, and it looks new after a very active summer season. As other reviews note, it "seems smaller" on the inside than it should be, owing to thick insulated walls. But it'll hold more than it looks like too! And yes, the lid opens inward partially. A little planning nullifies any issues here. Keeps cold. Real cold. Made in USA. Great price. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: MuscleSprouts

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. Can fit a 2 liter standing up.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to use for lunch, but we take it fishing and on other short outings. He works outside and it keeps his food and drinks cold all day, and if we forget to unpack it when he comes home the stuff inside is still pretty cold the next morning. It can fit a 2 liter of Dr Pepper standing up (but not Coke products- not sure about Pepsi ) which is nice. He also likes the height because he sits on it at break. It has cup holders and a spot in the middle that we figure is to hold a phone to watch videos- at least that is what we use it for.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooler, and I would buy again and recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I don't have a scientific review of this cooler, it holds ice and seems to be quality made. This is my travel in the car cooler. Fits nicely in the passenger seat and holds just what I need for some long drives. I don't remember what I paid for it, but if something happened to it...i'd check my history and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Igloo is a trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: I just went with Igloo as it is a trusted brand. I took my cooler to a camping trip to Lake Tahoe and the ice cubs inside were only half melted after 36 hours. Very strong and durable cooler. There is enough space to keep multiple items. Took some cooked veggies, butter, fruits and chocolates. Things were preserved and loved having this product.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek

customer_reviews.title: Good sturdy mid price cooler
customer_reviews.text: I like how sturdy this cooler seems. The lid and handle feel like they will stand up to some abuse. I've had this in use now daily for a while I the job site. I'm fairly happy weigh this one. It has plenty of room for drinks and lunch with ice. On the down side, you will need plenty of ice. I put 3 or 4 pounds of ice per day, and come home with cold water. It won't hold ice all day. That said, my drinks stay cold.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Mumma

customer_reviews.title: Broken p.o.s.
customer_reviews.text: It came in with the handle completely broken. Sending it back
customer_reviews.author: brandon911

customer_reviews.title: Great value...ROAD trip tested by Family of 5
customer_reviews.text: +Loved the price compared to others the same size +The size was perfect to keep snacks/drinks accessible while traveling in the van for family trips +Kept things cold a long time (We used the reusable ice packs.) +It has two places where you can attach locks for security/safety - The handle design is great but didn't feel as sturdy as I had imagined -Gripping it in the right spot to open it seemed a little awkward
customer_reviews.author: Works for Moms

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't seal.
customer_reviews.text: Upgrading this to 4 stars... Amazon sent me another and I returned the first which had a very loose fitting lid and was missing lockable loops. This one has a tighter fitting lid but doesn't seal. So if it gets rained or otherwise splashed on, water gets inside. Otherwise, I love the size and shape!
customer_reviews.author: Bahama Island Girl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son for his birthday, he's an auto class technician, always on the road. Based on the positive reviews I read from others who are in construction, this was the best and perfect size for him and will fit in his van and that will keep cold, and durable. I also got a few ice packs to go with it. Great and durable product, my son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Deidra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooler — keeps drinks cool, sturdy, durable
customer_reviews.text: I didn't do a very scientific test of this cooler, but it seemed to work great when I used for a road trip last week! It kept everything cold, even when there was very little ice, and the ice did not melt quickly. Obviously try to minimize how often you open the cooler and that'll make it much more effective, as is the case with virtually any cooler. This cooler is also sturdy and seems very durable. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband works outside in the heat all summer and needed a larger but not too large cooler to carry drinks and lunch containers. I often cook extra for supper and he takes left overs for lunch. The cooler he had previously held several drinks but had little room for food storage containers. This cooler has plenty of room without taking up too much room in the back floorboard of his truck. It does a great job keeping everything cold in hot Arkansas summers. He has thanked me several times for buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love the high profile
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler for packing lunches & snacks for a 12-14 hour day on the farm. I put a tall plastic sterlite container inside the cooler to keep my lunch & snacks separate from drinks & ice. Had no problem keeping things cold all day. Plenty big but not too big to put in your truck or tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Need a cooler big enough to hold 2 large water bottles (32 oz each) and multiple containers for lunch while working out on the roadside. This is a good size and big enough to sit on while eating.
customer_reviews.author: Glkibe

customer_reviews.title: good cooler. Can not lock.
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler. Good size for my purpose. Is defective though. See pics. Has the lock hole on the lid. But no lock hole on the body of the cooler. Nothing to lock the lid down to. So that feature is useless. If you are purchasing this for the locking ability, do not buy. This actually can not lock.
customer_reviews.author: don boston

customer_reviews.title: Its good
customer_reviews.text: Ok well I did want something sturdy and durable and great on price. The only thing I didnt like it was still some what small would like to have it a bit bigger. I can fit 6 16oz bottle of water along with 3 red bulls 8oz each 2 soda cans, but when adding the ice I cant really put my sandwich or snacks for work. I love it if just drinks where to go in it. I do love it tho. Great for its size sorry the bottles where all standing up NOT laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Garrido

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things cold a long time
customer_reviews.text: Keeps things cold at least 9 hours. I have not tested it for a longer time. I put one layer of ice in the bottom at night. The next morning there was some ice still left. This to “pre- cool” it. Used a medium sized blue ice and the cooler was only about 2/3’s full. Filled the cooler at 8 AM and at 5 PM everything was cold and the blue ice was still frozen solid.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell Dau

customer_reviews.title: Stays cold over 10 hours a day in the hot car
customer_reviews.text: This product has worked very well for my husband. He takes it to work and leaves it in the hot car for over 10 hours of working and the ice doesn’t melt much especially for how long leaving it in the car. It definitely keeps the food and drinks nice and cold for him. Due to Covid-19, he cannot eat his meals and snacks in the cafeteria. So this has helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Cox

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cooler for flying
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as checked luggage when flying. It was the perfect size for transporting frozen fish, and everything stayed frozen through two 3-hour flights. The handle folds flush with the cooler which is great since the last cooler I checked had it's handle ripped off. It also has tabs that allow for a lock or zip ties to secure the lid closed.
customer_reviews.author: uccello

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler because of the height and cut outs on the top. The height is great but the cut outs that are supposed to hold a drink and phone or tablet are completely too shallow. It will not hold anything at all. Sadly a complete waste of design. The bottom doesn’t fit flat and wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: Southern girl

customer_reviews.title: Cool to go!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a mailman and he takes a cooler to work every day! When I saw the bottom of his old one...corners GONE I needed to replace it. He truly beats the crap out of coolers and this one was the right size and price! It was a great replacement and keeps him cool on his route!
customer_reviews.author: Me!

customer_reviews.title: It's big
customer_reviews.text: Maybe a little too big for everyday lunch, unless you eat a lot. A LOT. Mine didn't have the 2nd set of loops on the front but since I'm not worried about locking my cooler, it doesn't bother me. The way that the lid is attached, if any small bits of debris fall down into the groove, when you open the lid it'll get scratched on the rounded rear edge. Noticed that the first day I had it.
customer_reviews.author: Terry L Peck

customer_reviews.title: Nice all around cooler
customer_reviews.text: We really like that the handle folds flat into the lid. It fits perfectly behind my seat. The added rings for tying it down or locking (maybe for alcoholic beverages for safety) is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: KRooRoo

customer_reviews.title: Big and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I have to pack a lunch every day and take to work this cooler is great because you have the extra height so you can do it like an entire lunch bag on top of like a six pack of bottled water in the bottom with ice packs big cooler big lunchbox. I feel like a body builder carrying this thing around at lunch...you can easily get 12 beers w ice in it...stays cold if you use real ice.. I’m taking it to retirement....
customer_reviews.author: 954Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer defect
customer_reviews.text: Mine also does not have the loops on the red part of the cooler opening, therefore it cannot lock. How the heck does this make it out of the factory and Q&A.. What a huge oversight. I guess they simply didn't care seeing how many people have mentioned it.
customer_reviews.author: X

customer_reviews.title: Solid cooler.
customer_reviews.text: This one is great cooler if you want a quick to move or not take up too much space cooler. I take it to work most of the time and it works great leave ice in there and it lasts about 2 days before its all melted. You can find it on sale it is great deal for about 15-20 bucks. Store near me cleared them out at end of summer for 8$ so I got 3 now.
customer_reviews.author: BEMAN

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cause I needed something small and portable to take with us when traveling for some drinks.. and this one definitely is the perfect size :) we're also using it for beach days.. fits a good amount for two people! and definitely very sturdy and high quality for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Yarii

customer_reviews.title: false advertising
customer_reviews.text: Did not include loop on the liner for locking. Returned first product to get replacement with the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: bad smell Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good size for weekend trip
customer_reviews.text: Although I have dreams of one of those expensive, trendy coolers, my budget keeps me in reality. I bought this cooler because I food prep due to diet and needed to cool a couple of days worth of prepared food. It did the trick. The ice held easily the first day. It was slush on day two, but my food was maintained at a safe temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size cooler for my use!
customer_reviews.text: Well built, perfect size. I prefer a couple of smaller coolers to one large cooler and this size is perfect. The handle folds out of the way too so storing these uses minimum space. They keep things nice and cold and also they do not have that annoying drain plug that can open up at the wrong time in the wrong spot. I bought two of these.
customer_reviews.author: spokes

customer_reviews.title: I like this cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy cooler. Keeps things cold for about 2 days. I did, hover, drill holes in the edge of the lid and injected spray foam for added insulation. Cooler body is all ready is foamed. Don't know why the lid wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one because it's deep enough to hold a gallon jug. It serves that purpose. So far, the handle is staying on. (It's prone to falling off on some other, smaller igloos). Passible for a lunch box but things getting warm by end of day. However, I'm hesitant to post too harshly as the hotel freezer doesn't fully freeze my ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: M. Milford

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product was a disappointment. I just got the cooler today thinking I can use it tomorrow for work. Realizing that I can't because the cooler had a massive cut on the bottom back end of the cooler but besides that everything else looked Good, you would think they would check to see if it's good to go before shipping them out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for an outdoor worker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband who has been looking at every cooler possible. He needed something hard, durable, water proof and large enough to hold multiple meals. He likes the cooler and only has had 1 issue. He went through a rainstorm and it did leak slightly but otherwise no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Doza

customer_reviews.title: Durable, keeps food cold
customer_reviews.text: Had this cooler for 6 months and my husband love it. Takes it to work every day. He's a trucker and said it fits perfectly in his cab and keeps his food cool on a long night (14 hours). Really durable, still looks like new and has been used as a seat many times. Cup and phone holders on top are fairly shallow so not that useful in a vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: Titch

customer_reviews.title: The reviews regarding broken handles are correct!
customer_reviews.text: Needless to say, this cooler was never used. We could tell from looking at it in the box that the handle was broken. And on a Friday starting a beach weekend. Disappointing. Find another cooler. We sure did!
customer_reviews.author: Janeliza

customer_reviews.title: IGLOO😁
customer_reviews.text: I got this item for under $15 and it was an awesome buy. Keeps my lunch and drinks cold all day with one large ice pack. I have no belief in those expensive name brand coolers. I believe this one works well enough. I wish it didn't have a black lid but oh well. For the price awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Bcool

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased, just as described
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once so impossible to judge durability and sturdiness. It kept items cold for the entire time necessary and was easy to clean up. The size is perfect for sitting on the floor in the back seat of my car. I have absolutely no complaints so far, and hopefully it will stay this way.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra DeLony

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my daughter who works long hours as a life guard. She is able to fit multiple bottles of water / Powerade/ snacks into this and have plenty of room for ice. I love it so much I’ve borrowed it for her little sister’s softball weekends. It’s perfect for several containers of fruit.
customer_reviews.author: rw

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly! I wanted this to be able to put drinks, lunch or whatever else I may want to store cool. I have this thing strapped in the back seat of my truck like a nestled baby hahaha. Great purchase definitely a nice price and great size, not to big or small, just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: any

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this twice, both the original and replacement has the missing red D rings. Making the securing and locking aspect useless.
customer_reviews.author: amzntoomuch

customer_reviews.title: Good size for the taller bottled waters
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my husband for his lunches and he LOVES it. Good size for the taller bottled waters, plenty of room for ice packs, lunch, water, Gatorade, etc plus he can use it to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: MVT

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size to take on a Day Trip or on an Extended Trip
customer_reviews.text: The cooler fits on the floor of the back seat of our car. There is no more stopping to add more bottles from the trunk to cool down. It's capacity is just right for bottles of water plus cans of soda for an all day travel schedule. It's contents remain cold all day. Medicine that needs refrigeration stays cold. We use one tray of refrigerator-made ice cubes and have plenty of room for our refreshments. The walls are sturdy enough to keep its contents cold. This is the size cooler my husband was hoping to find - and it was a great find!
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy - Keeps ICE for around 16 hours
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy - Keeps ICE for around 16 hours. Good for picnics or 1 day roadtrips. I only wish it had a drain feature at the bottom but it is lightweight so isnt that difficult to lift it up and pour out melted ice.
customer_reviews.author: Rashmi

customer_reviews.title: Really cool ice chest...LOL
customer_reviews.text: This is a great medium size ice chest, even better quality than I was expecting...sturdy and well built. Solid enough, you could sit on it without worry of damage. Nice color. Not too big or too small. This thing is going to get a lot of use in our household.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Black lid gets hot
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction so I use this cooler for my lunches. It’s the perfect size to carry a bunch of water bottles and Tupperware. The only thing I don’t like is that the lid gets hot during the day in the bed of my truck, and I think it warms up the rest of the cooler sooner than a white lid would.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Casale

customer_reviews.title: Watch the dimensions!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely cooler...however, I needed something to fit into it that was 9" wide and the outside dimension of 11" seemed like it should have been wide enough, but the interior dimension is only 8 1/4". So I have a nice cooler, but useless for the purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: P. H. Denson

customer_reviews.title: Not lockable only half of the loops needed
customer_reviews.text: I don't necessarily need to lock the thing but it is annoying to have a product description that is obviously wrong. If you need to lock it as part of using it - Don't get this one!
customer_reviews.author: andys mom

customer_reviews.title: Not as shown
customer_reviews.text: I mean ir works great but did not come as ordered. It should be able to be locked. It only had holes on the lid for a lock to go into. The bottom doesn’t even have it. How does that even happen? That was one of the main reasons I bought the thing.
customer_reviews.author: Pierre67

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep ice long at all. A box, not a cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Nice form factor but does not keep ice very long. I don't think there's any insulation in it at all.
customer_reviews.author: gw

customer_reviews.title: Fail
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks. Ice melts quick. Cold packs become not cold quick. Not recommended for weather warmer than 90*. Can sit on it bc it warps the top. Its pointless for a construction worker.
customer_reviews.author: Get it Got it

customer_reviews.title: Spacious, cold
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a work lunch box, it is a bit "bulky" for a work "lunch box" but does the trick! Also, we went to the beach this weekend and had 8 beers, 4 aluminum water containers, snacks, and plenty of ice in this thing that kept ice all day. Definitely what I was looking for with the reasonable price. 4 stars because of the black top.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. We use it mostly for storage of water bottles before going into fridg in RV so cannot really rate how well it keeps things cold. It is very well built.
customer_reviews.author: Tod Herrick

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Such a great upgrade from using the Playmate. Will hold 7 28oz Gatorade bottles cold all day full of ice. My cooler is in the back of delivery truck over 10 hours all day with temps up to 140° heat in cargo area. There was some melted ice turned to liquid cold water but still had solid ice still in the cooler when I got home.
customer_reviews.author: ERIK G

customer_reviews.title: Tall enough for a gallon of milk, small enough to keep in the car permanently
customer_reviews.text: It's tall enough for anything you're likely to bring home from the grocery store. It's small enough to keep in the car year-round. Nicely made in the USA. Lid closes securely, but not so tight that you have to struggle with it. An intelligently designed product.
customer_reviews.author: InTents

customer_reviews.title: Don’t search...buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic cooler. It seemed a little too large for what I thought I needed, but I was wrong. It’s a great size for everything that you possibly want to bring for breakfast and lunch. It holds a cold temp with the ice pack very well, as well as leaving enough room for Tupperware. The one design change I would have liked, is if they made a slot or a net on the underside of the lid to hold the ice pack. That would leave more room inside for items. Other than that, it’s a great cooler that I have finally come into possession of that has taken years to find.
customer_reviews.author: Brant

customer_reviews.title: Easily holds two meals and enough drinks
customer_reviews.text: I pack two meals for work everyday and this box is perfect for my needs. I'm a truck driver so it is kept in a controlled environment and can't speek on how well it will keep items at a specific temp. I love it though.
customer_reviews.author: David Winters Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, nice cooler, works
customer_reviews.text: Got a good deal on Amazon, under $20 for this to replace my old one. I feels strong and durable but only time will tell. Amazon delivered it in immaculate condition, no complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: GANBATEKUDASAI

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a decent product. However, mine arrived damaged (corners indented causing the cooler to not sit evenly on the floor. I don't think it will hold up well over time given how easily it was damaged during shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate product description or I just got screwed..?
customer_reviews.text: Soo this cooler is advertised as a "lockable" cooler. This is unable to lock down as advertised, arrived days later than expected delivery date and is now completely useless for my backpacking trip this weekend..if you're looking for a lockable cooler just order a different brand and avoid this BS
customer_reviews.author: Ray

product_meta.title: Igloo Profile 16 Quart
feature_bullets: Convenient bail handle folds flat into liner for easy stacking and storage
Lockable lid - molded loops on lid & liner by adding a lock (not included)
Media slot molded into lid holds cell phone or notebook upright for hands-free viewing
Bail handle folds flat into liner for easy stacking and storage
Cool riser technology improves cooling performance by elevating away from hot surfaces
Note: Keep the lid closed to maintain the temperature. Without a proper seal the cooler cannot maintain the needed temperature.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
